sentences.sentence: The pharmacist will make up your prescription.
sentences.translation: 药剂师会给你依处方配药。

sentences.sentence: He worked awhile as a pharmacist in Cincinnati.
sentences.translation: 他在辛辛那提做了一阵子的药剂师。

sentences.sentence: The pharmacist will advise which medicines are safe to take.
sentences.translation: 药剂师会建议服用哪些药才安全。
